title: bzip2 installation on Power8+NVIDIA platform
body:
I am trying to use Spack on our testbed for Sierra/Summit, and the installation of a few basic packages are failing at downloading/fetching through port 80.   


Here is what is happening.  Is there any fix/workaround?

